text: Daniel Lindström (born January 30, 1978) is a Swedish singer from Umeå. He won the Swedish Idol 2004 contest against Darin Zanyar. His first single, "Coming True", sold double platinum. His self-titled album, released in December 2004, was at the top of the Swedish pop charts. The new album Nån slags verklighet (Some kind of reality) contains songs written in Swedish by the singer himself. Daniel Lindström was the first winner of the Swedish Idol series. Category:Swedish singers Category:People from Umeå Category:1978 births Category:Living people
title: Daniel Lindström
